name: Shutter (itch) (Shesh Gaur)
description: Here's my submission for the Fall 2020 GD Jam. I didn't have time to make a tutorial (or fix the many, many bugs in the game, add sound effects , add a narrative and...), but all you have to do is find and deactivate all 5 trees on the map. There are security cameras that will send you back to the starting area if you get caught. There are  also these buttons around the map (they look like this: (<>)), that allow you to change the direction of time. (Also sorry about the ending lol)
